  • Classes in engine.forPiece used by engine.forBoard
    Class
    Description
    King
    The King class represents a king chess piece with specialized movement and castling capabilities.
    Pawn
    The Pawn class represents a pawn chess piece with its unique movement and capture rules.
    Piece
    The `Piece` class represents a piece on the board in a game of chess.
    Piece.PieceType
    The PieceType enum defines the types of chess pieces and their associated values.
    Rook
    The Rook class represents a rook chess piece.

    The PieceUtils class provides utility methods for creating and accessing pre-computed instances of moved chess pieces.

    The Queen class represents a queen chess piece, the most powerful piece on the board.
